alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Ochiltree; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beaver, Texas, Hutchinson, Hansford, Sherman, northwestern Ochiltree and Moore Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Morse, or 25 miles southeast of Stratford, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Borger, Guymon, Spearman, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Hooker, Stinnett, Goodwell, Gruver, Tyrone, Optima, Hardesty, Sanford, Pringle, Baker, Four Way, Masterson and Lake Meredith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
